Text.Page:
Siria,

Your unbridled passion for investigating the Omphalos Plains is truly admirable, but the fact remains that it's crawling with kumases and nagas and I can't protect you. My soldiers don't lack for courage, but I won't throw them away so you can satisfy your intellectual vanity!

Please heed this warning and return to Godric's Farm or the Sanctum Mysterium.

Centurion HerothPut away the letter.
